solution_line_template: The soda cans were consumed by {total_people} / {soda_drank_fraction_denominator} = <<{total_people}/{soda_drank_fraction_denominator}={soda_drinkers}>>{soda_drinkers} guests.

The sparkling water was consumed by {total_people} / {sparkling_water_drank_fraction_denominator} = <<{total_people}/{sparkling_water_drank_fraction_denominator}={sparkling_water_drinkers}>>{sparkling_water_drinkers} guests.
The juice bottles were consumed by {juice_consumed_fraction} x {total_juice_bottles} = <<{juice_consumed_fraction}*{total_juice_bottles}={juice_consumed}>>{juice_consumed} guests

In total there are {soda_drinkers} + {sparkling_water_drinkers} + {juice_consumed} = <<{soda_drinkers}+{sparkling_water_drinkers}+{juice_consumed}={total_recyclables}>>{total_recyclables} recyclable cans and bottles.
